name: Dream Fighter
description:
Dream Fighter is an old school shoot em up sidescroller with modern 3d graphic, real time lights and physics. In Dream Fighter you will use different ships for each world with different weapons and powers.

The main menu is a real level fully playable in first person, explore the main menu to unlock easter eggs and discover mini games!

MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:

Intel i3 3Ghz CPU or AMD equivalent.

VGA Nvidia GT 440 or AMD HD 6550 direct x 11

4 Gb ram

RECOMMENDED SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:

Intel i5 or AMD equivalent.

VGA AMD Radeon rx 460 or Nvidia GTX 1050

8 Gb ram
